Title: Home Is Where the Candle Is
Description:
Exciting to have new place call home, $n.

Not quite settled, though. We not know Gundargaz. Gundargaz not know us.

Time to fix both! Find out how help here. Teach new friends about us. Kobolds clever and friendly, so should be easy!

Start with help three kobolds.

Fourman Grimes want get to work right away. She very task oriented.

Granny Scribbles tell you lot about kobold culture.

And Janky want set up new business in town, sell candle to Gundargaz.
ObjectivesText: Assist Fourman Grimes, Janky, and Granny Scribbles.
CompletionText: How go? Granny Scribbles talk ear off yet?
RewardText: Thank you, $n. Have new home because you. Have future.
